testcase.classname: Verify User is on login page
testcase.name: User should be able to click on liquidity login button
testcase.system-out: Given User is on marketplace login page.....................................passed When Click on liquidity login button........................................passed Then User is on login page..................................................passed

testcase.classname: User should be able to access the liquidity platform
testcase.name: Login with valid credentials - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given User is on marketplace login page and enters valid username soundhar.g@qapita.com.passed And enters valid password Test123!.........................................passed And Click on Login button...................................................passed Then User should login successfully and be on organization page.............passed

testcase.name: Navigating to particular organization page
testcase.system-out: Given User is on organization page..........................................passed And Click on the organization...............................................passed Then User should be navigated to the homepage...............................passed

testcase.classname: User should be on the home page
testcase.name: Verify the user is on homepage
testcase.system-out: Given User is on home page and Information Modal opens......................passed When Click on Close icon of information modal...............................passed And Click on Manage Options.................................................passed And Select Exercise Options.................................................passed And Click on Create New Exercise Event Button...............................passed Then User should be navigated to the Exercise Event Creation page...........passed
